TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XContainer extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode
Public MustInherit Class XContainer Inherits XNode
public ref class XContainer abstract : System::Xml::Linq::XNode

summary.span: 表示可包含其他节点的节点。

span.span: Represents a node that can contain other nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供功能，例如查找下一步或上一个同级节点，或枚举的一个节点的直接子元素。This class provides functionality such as finding the next or previous sibling node, or enumerating the direct children of a node. 两个类派生自都和。The two classes that derive from are and .

summary.span: 将指定的内容作为子级添加到此 。

span.span: Adds the specified content as children to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将新内容添加的现有内容后面。This method adds the new content after the existing content of the . 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，，然后使用此方法将查询的结果添加到其中一个。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add the results of a query to one of them. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewElement", "Content") ); xmlTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Content xmlTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where CInt(el) >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(object content) cil managed

param.name: content
param.span: 要添加的包含简单内容的内容对象或内容对象集合。

summary.span: 将指定的内容添加为此 的子级。

span.span: Adds the specified content as children of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将新内容添加的现有内容后面。This method adds the new content after the existing content of the . 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，并使用此方法以添加到其中的对象。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add an object to one of them. 它还添加了结果的[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]到 XML 树的查询。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.Add(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.Add(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.Add(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.Add(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 new content 4 5 ```

summary.span: 将指定的内容添加为此 的子级。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将新内容添加的现有内容后面。This method adds the new content after the existing content of the . 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，然后使用此方法将添加到其中的对象。The following example creates two XML trees, uses this method to add an object to one of them. 它还添加了结果的[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]到 XML 树的查询。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.Add(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.Add(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.Add(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.Add(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 new content 4 5 ```

summary.span: 将指定内容作为此文档或元素的第一个子级添加。

span.span: Adds the specified content as the first children of this document or element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加新内容的现有内容之前。This method adds the new content before the existing content of the . 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，，然后使用此方法将查询的结果添加到其中一个。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add the results of a query to one of them. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewElement", "Content") ); xmlTree.AddFirst( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = Content xmlTree.AddFirst( _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where CInt(el) >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 Content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加新内容的现有内容之前。This method adds the new content before the existing content of the . 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，然后使用此方法将添加对象作为第一个元素到其中一个。The following example creates two XML trees, uses this method to add an object as the first element to one of them. 它还添加了结果的[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]到 XML 树的查询。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.AddFirst(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.AddFirst( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.AddFirst(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.AddFirst( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 4 5 new content 1 2 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加新内容的现有内容之前。This method adds the new content before the existing content of the . 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 以下示例创建两个 XML 树，并使用此方法将添加对象作为第一个元素到其中一个。The following example creates two XML trees, and uses this method to add an object as the first element to one of them. 它还添加了结果的[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]到 XML 树的查询。It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.AddFirst(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); xmlTree.AddFirst( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el > 3 select el ); // Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not // throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.Element("Child9")); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 xmlTree.AddFirst(New XElement("NewChild", "new content")) xmlTree.AddFirst( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where CInt(el) > 3 _ Select el _ ) ' Even though Child9 does not exist in srcTree, the following statement will not ' throw an exception, and nothing will be added to xmlTree. xmlTree.AddFirst(srcTree.) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 4 5 new content 1 2 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XmlWriter CreateWriter() cil managed

summary.span: 创建可用于将节点添加至 的 。

span.span: Creates an that can be used to add nodes to the .
An that is ready to have content written to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化时，从 XML 树中的命名空间属性推断出命名空间前缀。While serializing, namespace prefixes are inferred from the namespace attributes in the XML tree. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ## Examples 此方法可用于执行 XSLT 转换。You can use this method to perform an XSLT transformation. 你可以创建 XML 树，创建从 XML 树中，创建一个新文档，并创建，以写入新文档。You can create an XML tree, create an from the XML tree, create a new document, and create a that will write into the new document. 然后，可以调用 XSLT 转换，传入和的转换。Then, you can invoke the XSLT transformation, passing the and to the transform. 在转换成功完成后，使用转换的结果，填充新的 XML 树。After the transformation successfully completes, the new XML tree is populated with the results of the transformation. ```csharp string xslMarkup = @" "; XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XElement("Parent", new XElement("Child1", "Child1 data"), new XElement("Child2", "Child2 data") ) ); XDocument newTree = new XDocument(); using (XmlWriter writer = newTree.CreateWriter()) { // Load the style sheet. XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform(); xslt.Load(XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xslMarkup))); // Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateReader(), writer); } Console.WriteLine(newTree); ``` ```vb Dim xslMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Child1 data Child2 data Dim newTree As XDocument = New XDocument() Using writer As XmlWriter = newTree.CreateWriter() ' Load the style sheet. Dim xslt As XslCompiledTransform = _ New XslCompiledTransform() xslt.Load(xslMarkup.CreateReader()) ' Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateReader(), writer) End Using Console.WriteLine(newTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Child1 data Child2 data ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XNode> DescendantNodes() cil managed
Public Function DescendantNodes () As IEnumerable(Of XNode)

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的子代节点集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the descendant nodes for this document or element, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，其中按文档顺序包含 的子代节点。

span.span: An of containing the descendant nodes of the , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，属性不被视为中的节点[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]，因此不会通过此方法返回的集合的一部分。Note that attributes are not considered to be nodes in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], so they will not be part of the collection that is returned by this method. 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树，，然后循环访问轴。The following example creates an XML tree, and then iterates through the axis. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", // Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. new XAttribute("Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement("Child", new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable dnas = from node in xmlTree.DescendantNodes() select node; foreach (XNode node in dnas) { if (node is XElement) Console.WriteLine((node as XElement).Name); else Console.WriteLine(node); } ``` ```vb ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ element content Dim dnas = From node In xmlTree.DescendantNodes _ Select node For Each node In dnas If TypeOf node Is XElement Then Console.WriteLine(DirectCast(node, XElement).Name) Else Console.WriteLine(node) End If Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Child GrandChild element content ```

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的子代元素集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Descendants() cil managed
Public Function Descendants () As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的子代元素集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，其中包含 的子代元素。

span.span: An of containing the descendant elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意此方法将返回本身在随后出现。Note that this method will not return itself in the resulting . 请参阅如果您需要包括当前结果中。See if you need to include the current in the results. 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树，，然后使用此轴方法检索子代。The following example creates an XML tree, and then uses this axis method to retrieve the descendants. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement("Child", new XText("Some text"), new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable de = from el in xmlTree.Descendants() select el; foreach (XElement el in de) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Some text element content Dim de = From el In xmlTree.Descendants _ Select el For Each el In de Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Child GrandChild ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Descendants(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed
Public Function Descendants (name As XName) As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

span.span: The to match.

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的已筛选的子代元素集合。

span.span: Returns a filtered collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.

summary.span: 集合中仅包括具有匹配 的元素。

span.span: Only elements that have a matching are included in the collection.

returns.span: 的 ，其中包含与指定 相匹配的 的子代元素。

span.span: An of containing the descendant elements of the that match the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 以下示例输出元素的所有后代。The following example prints all descendants of an element. ```csharp // Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement("Child", new XText("Some text"), new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable de = from el in xmlTree.Descendants("Child") select el; foreach (XElement el in de) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by the descendants axis. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Some text element content Dim de = From el In xmlTree... _ Select el For Each el In de Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Child ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp // Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by DescendantNodes. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(aw + "Att1", "AttributeContent"), new XElement(aw + "Child", new XText("Some text"), new XElement(aw + "GrandChild", "element content") ) ); IEnumerable de = from el in xmlTree.Descendants(aw + "Child") select el; foreach (XElement el in de) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() ' Attributes are not nodes, so will not be returned by the descendants axis. Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ Some text element content Dim de = From el In xmlTree... _ Select el For Each el In de Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Child ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Linq.XElement Element(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed
Public Function Element (name As XName) As XElement

span.span: The to match.

summary.span: 获取具有指定的 的第一个（按文档顺序）子元素。

span.span: Gets the first (in document order) child element with the specified .

returns.span: 与指定的 相匹配的 ，或者为 。

span.span: A that matches the specified , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回`null`如果没有具有指定名称的元素。Returns `null` if there is no element with the specified name. 一些轴方法返回元素或属性的集合。Some axis methods return collections of elements or attributes. 此方法返回单个元素。This method returns only a single element. 此方法返回`null`如果找不到具有指定名称的元素。This method returns `null` if the element with the specified name is not found. 所有方法，可用于构造元素 (的构造函数，等) 接受`null`作为有效参数。All of the methods that allow you to construct elements (the constructor of , , and so on) accept `null` as a valid argument. 这使您可以使用方便的用法： 可以作为函数构造的一部分来调用此方法，该元素添加到正在构造当且仅当源树中存在的元素的 XML 树。This allows you to use a convenient idiom: you can call this method as part of functional construction, and the element is added to the XML tree being constructed if and only if the element exists in the source tree. 下面的示例演示了此用法。The following example shows this idiom. 与，此方法不是轴方法。In contrast to , this method is not an axis method. 它不使用延迟的执行;它只是返回的元素时调用。It does not use deferred execution; it simply returns an element when called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的两种用法。The following example shows two uses of this method. 在一种情况下，该方法查找中的元素`srcTree`。In one case, the method finds the element in `srcTree`. 在第二个的情况下，该方法不会查找元素，在源树中，不将元素添加到`xmlTree`，并不会引发异常。In the second case, the method does not find the element in the source tree, no element is added to `xmlTree`, and no exception is thrown. 请注意，Visual Basic 示例使用子 XML 属性。Note that the Visual Basic example uses the child XML property. 它也是允许使用直接在 Visual Basic 中的方法。It is also allowable to use the method directly in Visual Basic. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Element1", 1), new XElement("Element2", 2), new XElement("Element3", 3), new XElement("Element4", 4), new XElement("Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), srcTree.Element("Element3"), // Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, the following line // will not throw an exception. srcTree.Element("Element9") ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 <%= srcTree. %> <%= srcTree. %> ' Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, adding it to the tree ' will not throw an exception. Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 3 ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement srcTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Element1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Element2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Element3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Element4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Element5", 5) ); XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Child2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Child3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Child4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Child5", 5), srcTree.Element(aw + "Element3"), // Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, the following line // will not throw an exception. srcTree.Element(aw + "Element9") ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 <%= srcTree. %> <%= srcTree. %> ' Even though Element9 does not exist in srcTree, adding it to the tree ' will not throw an exception. Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 4 5 3 ```

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的子元素集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Elements() cil managed
Public Function Elements () As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的子元素集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，其中按文档顺序包含此 的子元素。

span.span: An of containing the child elements of this , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树，，然后选择使用此轴方法的某些元素。The following example creates an XML tree, and then selects some elements using this axis method. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements() where (int)el <= 3 select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree.Elements _ Where el.Value <= 3 _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Child2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Child3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Child4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Child5", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements() where (int)el <= 3 select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree.Elements _ Where el.Value <= 3 _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XElement> Elements(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed
Public Function Elements (name As XName) As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

span.span: The to match.

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的已筛选的子元素集合。

span.span: Returns a filtered collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.

summary.span: 集合中仅包括具有匹配 的元素。

span.span: Only elements that have a matching are included in the collection.

returns.span: 的 ，其中按文档顺序包含具有匹配 的 的子级。

span.span: An of containing the children of the that have a matching , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树，，然后选择使用此轴方法的多个子元素。The following example creates an XML tree, and then selects several child elements using this axis method. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Type1", 1), new XElement("Type1", 2), new XElement("Type2", 3), new XElement("Type2", 4), new XElement("Type2", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements("Type2") select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree. _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 4 5 ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Type1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Type1", 2), new XElement(aw + "Type2", 3), new XElement(aw + "Type2", 4), new XElement(aw + "Type2", 5) ); IEnumerable elements = from el in xmlTree.Elements(aw + "Type2") select el; foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim elements = From el In xmlTree. _ Select el For Each el In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FirstNode As XNode
public: property System::Xml::Linq::XNode ^ FirstNode { System::Xml::Linq::XNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此节点的第一个子节点。

span.span: Get the first child node of this node.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含 的第一个子节点。

span.span: An containing the first child node of the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例创建一个包含子元素的元素。The following example creates an element that contains child elements. 然后获取父元素的第一个子节点。It then gets the first child node of the parent element. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); XNode firstNode = xmlTree.FirstNode; Console.WriteLine(firstNode); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim firstNode As XNode = xmlTree.FirstNode Console.WriteLine(firstNode) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 ```

summary.span: 获取此节点的最后一个子节点。

span.span: Get the last child node of this node.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含 的最后一个子节点。

span.span: An containing the last child node of the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例创建一个包含子元素的元素。The following example creates an element that contains child elements. 然后获取父元素的最后一个子节点。It then gets the last child node of the parent element. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); XNode lastNode = xmlTree.LastNode; Console.WriteLine(lastNode); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim lastNode As XNode = xmlTree.LastNode Console.WriteLine(lastNode) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.Linq.XNode> Nodes() cil managed
Public Function Nodes () As IEnumerable(Of XNode)

summary.span: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的子节点集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the child nodes of this element or document, in document order.

returns.span: 的 ，其中按文档顺序包含此 的内容。

span.span: An of containing the contents of this , in document order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，内容不包含属性。Note that the content does not include attributes. 在[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]，属性不被视为是树的节点。In [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], attributes are not considered to be nodes of the tree. 它们是与元素关联的名称/值对。They are name/value pairs associated with an element. 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有各种类型的节点的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of nodes. 然后查询此轴方法来枚举和输出节点。It then queries this axis method to enumerate and print the nodes. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XComment("a comment"), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XText("mixed content"), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); IEnumerable nodes = from nd in xmlTree.Nodes() select nd; foreach (XNode node in nodes) Console.WriteLine(node); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4mixed content5 Dim nodes = From nd In xmlTree.Nodes() _ Select nd For Each node In nodes Console.WriteLine(node) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 4 mixed content 5 ``` 以下示例创建一个包含各种类型的节点的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that contains a variety of types of nodes. 它然后枚举的树中，打印的节点类型各部分。It then enumerates through portions of the tree, printing the node types. ```csharp XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XComment("a comment"), new XProcessingInstruction("xml-stylesheet", "type=\"text/xsl\" href=\"hello.xsl\""), new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "attContent"), new XElement("Child1", new XCData("CDATA content") ), new XElement("Child2", new XText("Text content") ) ) ); foreach (XNode node in xmlTree.Nodes()) { Console.WriteLine(node.NodeType); if (node.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element) { foreach (XAttribute att in ((XElement)node).Attributes()) Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType); foreach (XNode node2 in ((XElement)node).Nodes()) { Console.WriteLine(node2.NodeType); if (node2.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element) foreach (XNode node3 in ((XElement)node2).Nodes()) Console.WriteLine(node3.NodeType); } } } ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XDocument = _

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveNodes() cil managed

summary.span: 从此文档或元素中移除子节点。

span.span: Removes the child nodes from this document or element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在包含属性的元素上调用此方法，此方法不会删除属性。If you call this method on an element that contains attributes, this method will not remove the attributes. 若要删除元素的属性，请使用。To remove the attributes of an element, use . 方法具有相关的功能。The method has related functionality. 它在集合中删除的每个节点的子节点。It removes the child nodes of every node in a collection. 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 以下示例创建包含一些子节点的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that contains some child nodes. 然后，它调用此方法来删除子节点。It then calls this method to remove the child nodes. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XComment("a comment"), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XText("mixed content"), new XElement("Child5", 5) ); xmlTree.RemoveNodes(); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim xmltree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4mixed content5 xmltree.RemoveNodes() Console.WriteLine(xmltree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

summary.span: 使用指定内容替换此文档或元素的子节点。

span.span: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. 此方法具有快照语义。This method has snapshot semantics. 它首先创建一份新的内容。It first creates a copy of the new content. 它然后删除此节点的所有子节点。It then removes all children nodes of this node. 最后，它将作为子节点添加新内容。Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes. 这意味着您可以替换上自己的子节点中使用查询的子节点。This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，，然后使用此方法将其中之一的内容替换为查询的结果。The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to replace the contents of one of them with the results of a query. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); root.ReplaceNodes( from el in root.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 root.ReplaceNodes( _ From el In root.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReplaceNodes(object content) cil managed

param.name: content
param.span: 用于替换子节点的包含简单内容的内容对象或内容对象集合。

span.span: A content object containing simple content or a collection of content objects that replace the children nodes.

summary.span: 使用指定内容替换此文档或元素的子节点。

span.span: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. 此方法具有快照语义。This method has snapshot semantics. 它首先创建一份新的内容。It first creates a copy of the new content. 它然后删除此节点的所有子节点。It then removes all children nodes of this node. 最后，它将作为子节点添加新内容。Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes. 这意味着您可以替换上自己的子节点中使用查询的子节点。This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个包含子节点的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that contains children nodes. 然后它将替换所有子节点包含一个元素。It then replaces all of the children nodes with a single element. 若要替换的子节点的结果的示例，请参阅[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查询，请参阅。To see an example of replacing the children nodes with the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query, see . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); root.ReplaceNodes( from el in root.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 root.ReplaceNodes( _ From el In root.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReplaceNodes(object[] content) cil managed
Public Sub ReplaceNodes (ParamArray content As Object())

span.span: A parameter list of content objects.

summary.span: 使用指定内容替换此文档或元素的子节点。

span.span: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. 此方法具有快照语义。This method has snapshot semantics. 它首先创建一份新的内容。It first creates a copy of the new content. 它然后删除此节点的所有子节点。It then removes all children nodes of this node. 最后，它将作为子节点添加新内容。Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes. 这意味着您可以替换上自己的子节点中使用查询的子节点。This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个字典，以及 XML 树。The following example creates a dictionary and an XML tree. 然后它查询字典，并将结果投影到的，并将 XML 树的内容替换为查询的结果。It then queries the dictionary, projects the results to an of , and replaces the contents of the XML tree with the results of the query. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); root.ReplaceNodes( from el in root.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 root.ReplaceNodes( _ From el In root.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select el) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```
